readAll.description: Allow read permission on all accounts resources for one or more accounts

readIdentities.description: Allow read permission on sort-code, account number and name for one or more accounts

readBalances.description: Allow read access to balances for one or more accounts

readProducts.description: Allow read access to product details for one or more accounts

readBeneficiaries.description: Allow read access to beneficiaries for one or more accounts
